title: Assessment of water quality and emerging pollutants in two fish species from the mallorquin swamp in the Colombian Caribbean
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Cindy Elles-Pérez, Maria Guzman-Tordecilla, Yuliceth Ramos, Margarita Castillo-Ramírez, Andrea Moreno-Ríos, Carolina Garzón-Rodríguez, Jacquelin Rojas-Solano
